header.title: BookItSafari - Plan, Compare & Buy Bus Tickets Online Across Tanzania

hero.headline: Travel Across Tanzania With Ease
hero.subheadline: Book bus tickets to any region in Tanzania. Compare prices, choose your seat, and pay securely with mobile money or card.

features.weAreCommitted: We're committed to making your journey across Tanzania safe, comfortable, and hassle-free.
features.secureBookingDesc: Your data and payments are protected with bank-level encryption.
features.realtimeUpdatesDesc: Get instant notifications about schedule changes and delays.
features.easyPaymentsDesc: Pay with M-Pesa, Tigo Pesa, Airtel Money, or cards via ClickPesa.
features.support24Desc: Our team is always here to help you with any questions.
features.allOfTanzaniaDesc: Connect to all 31 regions with trusted bus operators.
features.verifiedOperatorsDesc: All operators are vetted for safety and quality service.

howItWorks.bookInSteps: Book your bus ticket in just a few simple steps. Fast, easy, and secure.
howItWorks.searchDesc: Enter your departure city, destination, and travel date to find available buses.
howItWorks.chooseDesc: Compare buses, departure times, prices, and amenities to find your perfect ride.
howItWorks.payDesc: Securely pay using ClickPesa, mobile money, or card payments.
howItWorks.travelDesc: Receive your e-ticket with QR code. Show it at boarding and enjoy your journey!

meta.description: BookItSafari enables you to plan your trip, compare and buy tickets online for long distance buses across Tanzania. Book bus tickets to any region - Dar es Salaam, Arusha, Mwanza, Dodoma, Mbeya and more. Choose your seat, pay securely with mobile money or card.
